name: Highlight DQ Rules
description: Module that highlights the DQ rule errors when reviewing data

authors.name: Richard Hardy
authors.institution: University of Cambridge - Cambridge Cancer Trials Centre

project-settings.name: A role that can view the highlight DQ rule errors
When checked, shows the data quality rule error in line with the question
When checked, the excluded rules are not shown in a table below the errored rules
When checked, the data status icon is not replaced with the standard grey icon
